descriptions.description_input: In the input, you should see...gray and black blocks in a check style.
descriptions.description_output_grid_size: The output grid size... is the same as the input.
descriptions.description_output: To make the output, you have to...starting with the second vertical color every other gray block green. Black remains the same.

descriptions.description_input: In the input, you should see...Grey squares on black background
descriptions.description_output_grid_size: The output grid size...same as input
descriptions.description_output: To make the output, you have to...Every other square inside of a vertical column needs to be colored green. There are 12 columns. Start from left side of pattern and moving to the right. Skip the first column all the way from the left. Move to second column form the left and color the grey square green. Skip the third column grey square. Repeat this pattern.

descriptions.description_input: In the input, you should see...a black picture with some box green
descriptions.description_output_grid_size: The output grid size... not change
descriptions.description_output: To make the output, you have to...make white change to green as necessary

descriptions.description_input: In the input, you should see... Black background with gray squares
descriptions.description_output_grid_size: The output grid size...same as input
descriptions.description_output: To make the output, you have to... Starting with second vertical, change gray to green every other vertical.

descriptions.description_output_grid_size: The output grid size...remains the same
descriptions.description_output: To make the output, you have to... change gray squares to green so half the gray squares remain.
